attributes.action: Compensation towards the neutering, micro chipping of an xl bully ‘type’
attributes.additional_details: Help the general public who own American XL bullies with costs or vouchers towards the micro chipping and neutering or spaying so they can comply with the exemption process
attributes.background: I would like the government to compensate responsible dog owners of an XL bully type towards the costs of neutering and micro chipping, their beloved dogs NOT compensation euthanasia

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648328
